description: When Beckett returns the next night I have Randy there to give Beckett what he wanted so badly to get the night before. Randy jumps at the chance and so the second video in our War Chest Update tonight features Randy fucking the daylights out of Beckett and Beckett takes it like a real champ. You gotta check this out as it is one hell of a duo scene between these two.
title: Beckett & Randy, Scene #01
